results.content:
This is not a bootcamp in the sense of a beginners' course.

The presentation is somewhat insecure and the course needs post-editing and more preparation.

That said, there is some potentially great material here for intermediate level learners.
results.content_html:
This is not a bootcamp in the sense of a beginners' course.

The presentation is somewhat insecure and the course needs post-editing and more preparation.

That said, there is some potentially great material here for intermediate level learners.

results.content: The tutorials are great, well explained and easy to follow. The pace is not too quick or slow and the way the content is delivered makes it easy to understand.
results.content_html: The tutorials are great, well explained and easy to follow. The pace is not too quick or slow and the way the content is delivered makes it easy to understand.

results.content: Overall, I enjoyed the course and learned a lot while taking it. Be aware that there are some concepts you cannot know as a beginner and you must know basics of Java before you start this course.
results.content_html: Overall, I enjoyed the course and learned a lot while taking it. Be aware that there are some concepts you cannot know as a beginner and you must know basics of Java before you start this course.
